alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 9:50AM PDT until March 13 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet snow. From 10 AM to 5 PM, additional snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Boulder Creek Road, Sherman Pass, Wauconda, and Chesaw Road. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Motorists with plans to travel across the high terrain of Ferry and eastern Okanogan county should be prepared for winter driving conditions. Exposed ridges will experience wind gusts up to 45 mph leading to blowing and drifting of snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet and heavy snow accumulations are expected at Sherman Pass on State Route 20.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
